body_html: Just to clarify: if you run the ConfigureDistributedTPU Op, does all the memory get freed? I was assuming you were looking for an Op to free memory that is more lightweight than configure. If configure doesn't free memory then that is a different bug.
body_text: Just to clarify: if you run the ConfigureDistributedTPU Op, does all the memory get freed? I was assuming you were looking for an Op to free memory that is more lightweight than configure. If configure doesn't free memory then that is a different bug.
body: Just to clarify: if you run the ConfigureDistributedTPU Op, does all the memory get freed? I was assuming you were looking for an Op to free memory that is more lightweight than configure. If configure doesn't free memory then that is a different bug.
